comments.author: jkratzer@mozilla.com

comments.text: This doesn't look like it specifically relates to WebGL at all, and seems more like this should be filed as a DOM bug, unless I am missing something.
comments.author: lsalzman@mozilla.com

comments.text:
(In reply to Lee Salzman [:lsalzman] from comment #1)
> This doesn't look like it specifically relates to WebGL at all, and seems
> more like this should be filed as a DOM bug, unless I am missing something.

My mistake.  Looks like I used the wrong template when submitting this.
comments.author: jkratzer@mozilla.com

comments.text: Looks like this regressed in bug 1316330. Olli, since you reviewed the change that likely caused this, needinfo'ing you.
comments.author: annevk@annevk.nl

comments.text: I'm going to mark this P3 because it sounds like we've shipped this for a while.
comments.author: continuation@gmail.com

assigned_to_detail.name: nobody@mozilla.org
assigned_to_detail.real_name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it
